Title: Dealing With Unhappy Team Members and Customers
Description:
Today, we’ll hear from:

•      A business leader struggling to train and delegate to a team member

•      Leadership principles learned from extreme sports with Alison Levine

•      A house call dentist who feels guilty for making a profit

•      A small-business owner wanting advice on how to enforce a cancellation policy with grace
